src:
Mau Semakin Jaya, Liverpool Harus Bajak N'Golo Kante
03 Nov 2019, 04:40 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Sebuah saran diberikan Jason McAteer kepada Liverpool. Mantan gelandang The Reds itu menilai mantan timnya perlu mendatangkan N'Golo Kante ke Anfield.
Musim ini Liverpool memang memiliki cukup banyak gelandang. Mereka memiliki stok yang berlimpah untuk posisi tersebut.
Namun dari gelandang-gelandang Liverpool, mereka hanya memiliki satu gelandang bertahan saja. Ia adalah Fabinho yang direkrut dari AS Monaco pada tahun 2018 kemarin.
McAteer percaya bahwa Liverpool harus mencari pemain yang bisa menjadi pendamping Fabinho di skuatnya. "Peran seorang gelandang bertahan sudah berkembang pesat di sepakbola modern," buka McAteer kepada The Racing Post.

Baca komentar lengkap eks gelandang Liverpool itu di bawah ini.
text:
Want More Jaya, Liverpool Must Plow N'Golo Kante
Nov 3 2019, 04:40 by Bola.net
Bola.net - A suggestion given by Jason McAteer to Liverpool. The former Reds midfielder thinks his former team needs to bring N'Golo Kante to Anfield.
This season Liverpool does have quite a number of midfielders. They have an abundant stock of these positions.
But from the Liverpool midfielders, they only have one defensive midfielder. He is Fabinho who was recruited from AS Monaco in 2018 yesterday.
McAteer believes that Liverpool must find a player who can be Fabinho's companion in his squad. "The role of a defensive midfielder has developed rapidly in modern football," McAteer opened to The Racing Post.

Read the full comments of the former Liverpool midfielder below.
